egl.math

Class Matrix3d

  • java.lang.Object
    • egl.math.Matrix3d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Matrix3d
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    3x3 Matrix With Row Major Ordering
    Single Precision
    Author:
    Cristian

        Transforms And Homogenizes A Position Vector In Place
 
         {V, w} = This * {V, 1}
 V = V / w
 
        

        Parameters:
        v - [POS] Vector
        

        Returns:
        Transformed Vector

        createRotation
        

        public static Matrix3d createRotation(double t,
                      Matrix3d out)
        

        Create A Rotation Matrix Into Out
 
         | cos(t)  -sin(t)  0 |
 | sin(t)   cos(t)  0 |
 | 0        0       1 |
 
        

        Parameters:
        t - Angle (Radians)
        out - Non-Null Output Matrix
        

        Returns:
        Out

 | 0  sin(t)   cos(t) |

        createOrthographic
        

        public static Matrix3d createOrthographic(double l,
                          double r,
                          double b,
                          double t,
                          Matrix3d out)
        

        Create An Orthographic Matrix Into Out
 
         Let w = r - l
 Let h = t - b
 | 2 / w  0      -(l + r) / w |
 | 0      2 / h  -(b + t) / h |
 | 0      0       1           |
 
        

        Parameters:
        l - Left Side Of Rect
        r - Right Side Of Rect
        b - Bottom Side Of Rect
        t - Top Side Of Rect
        out - Non-Null Output Matrix
        

        Returns:
        Out
        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        createOrthographic
        

        public static Matrix3d createOrthographic(double l,
                          double r,
                          double b,
                          double t)
        

        Parameters:
        l - Left Side Of Rect
        r - Right Side Of Rect
        b - Bottom Side Of Rect
        t - Top Side Of Rect
        

        Returns:
        New Matrix
        See Also:
        #createOrthographic(double, double, double, double, Matrix3d) Mat3.createOrthographic(l, r, b, t, new Mat3())}
